item.description:
For our traditional Columbus Day lunch, we've selected a venue that appropriately overlooks the Atlantic. The Fairview Inn and Restaurant in Marshfield offers a view worthy of its name, as well as a beautiful and atmospheric interior.

And the food? Reviewers online seem pretty uniform in declaring that the interesting menu is well executed. (We have to admit, they had us at "jambalaya". And kept us with white chocolate bread pudding.)

We hope that those of you who have the day off will join us in Marshfield as we discover the Fairview's charms for ourselves.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Fairview Inn and Restaurant
133 OceanStreet
Marshfield, MA 02020

(781) 834-9144

Website: Fairview Inn and Restaurant

Organizer: Mike

Guests: Yes. Two per member allowed. For questions about exceptions, please contact Mike.

Price Range: The online menu lists nine lunch entrees ranging from $12.95 - $14.95. Burgers and sandwiches are available - all but one for under $10.00 - and a selection of grilled pizzas tops out at $11.95.

Event Fee: Current Annual Members - None, Group Members - $2.00, Guests - $2.00.

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over five years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

RSVP Deadline: Sunday, October 9th @ 3:00 pm. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by the Event Organizer. Changes to "No" after the deadline will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us Pages.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: The Fairview Inn and Restaurant is located on Ocean Street in Marshfield: This is the main road that runs along the waterfront in the Brant Rock section of Marshfield. Diners who previously joined us at Haddad's or the Fieldston should find themselves on familiar territory.
item.how_to_find_us: Our reservation is under both 'Mike' and 'South Shore Meetup Group'.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Columbus Day by the Sea!
